public abstract class AbstractOCSPResponder extends Object implements OCSPResponder

      Constructor for the abstract OCSP responder.
      Parameters:
      ocspModel - configuration data for the OCSP responder
      ocspIssuerCredential - the private key object used to sign OCSP responses
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - unsupported algorithm

  • Method Details

    • handleRequest

      public org.bouncycastle.cert.ocsp.OCSPResp handleRequest(org.bouncycastle.asn1.ocsp.OCSPRequest ocspRequest) throws CertificateRevocationException
      Process a request for certificate status information.
      Specified by:
      handleRequest in interface OCSPResponder
      Parameters:
      ocspRequest - OCSP request
      Returns:
      OCSP response
      Throws:
      CertificateRevocationException - on exceptions that prevents generation of an OCSP response

    • getCertStatus

      protected abstract org.bouncycastle.cert.ocsp.CertificateStatus getCertStatus(BigInteger certificateSerial) throws OCSPStatusCheckingException
      Determines the status of a certificate identified by its serial number. If this request fails, an OCSPStatusCheckingException is thrown that specifies the appropriate response code of the OCSP response.
      Parameters:
      certificateSerial - serial number of the certificate being checked by the OCSP responder
      Returns:
      the status of the requested certificate
      Throws:
      OCSPStatusCheckingException - on errors handling the request for certificate status leading to an unsuccessful response and containing the response status that should be applied in the error response

    • validateRequest

      protected void validateRequest(org.bouncycastle.asn1.ocsp.TBSRequest tbsRequest) throws OCSPStatusCheckingException
      Provides checks to the OCSP request. Extended tests such as signature checks on signed requests can be performed by extending this function.

      If validation fails, this function must throw an OCSPStatusCheckingException which must contain the response status used to send an error response

      Parameters:
      tbsRequest - OCSP request to validate
      Throws:
      OCSPStatusCheckingException - if request validation fails

    • validateCertID

      protected void validateCertID(org.bouncycastle.asn1.ocsp.CertID certID) throws OCSPStatusCheckingException
      Validate that the CertID is legitimate and represents a certificate for which this OCSP responder is authorized to provide status information.
      Parameters:
      certID - the certificate ID
      Throws:
      OCSPStatusCheckingException - if the certificate ID is not valid or this OCSP responder is not authorized
